The 'disable cache' flag must affect on the certificate fetch request.

* http://localhost:8000/loading/htxg/resources/127.0.0.1.sxg.pem.cbor
  cached: false
* http://localhost:8000/loading/htxg/resources/127.0.0.1.sxg.pem.cbor
  cached: false
* http://localhost:8000/loading/htxg/resources/127.0.0.1.sxg.pem.cbor
  cached: true
* http://localhost:8000/loading/htxg/resources/127.0.0.1.sxg.pem.cbor
  cached: true
